Html:
I have a paragraph (addParagraphStyle) and would like to start with a new line in the paragraph. In Word it would be SHIFT ENTER. How can I program that?

 

Thanks Martin

$section->addTextBreak($num);

$num ï¼š To break how many lines

In my Word the command

$section->addTextBreak($num);

creates paragraphs. In need a new line in the paragraph. Like SHIFT ENTER in Word

 

Thanks Martin
